TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationDirectory extends System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase

Docs.summary: Provides the application directory as evidence for policy evaluation. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The domain host can associate a file directory with an application domain. The evidence for policy evaluation is provided only when the application domain is associated with a file directory.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The path of the application directory.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Application code does not need to create instances of this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
Docs.returns: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Copy() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new copy of the .
Docs.returns: A new, identical copy of the .

Docs.summary: Gets the path of the application directory.
Docs.value: The path of the application directory.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object o) cil managed

Docs.param: An object of same type as the current evidence object.
Docs.summary: Determines whether instances of the same type of an evidence object are equivalent.
Docs.returns: if the two instances are equivalent; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The directory values of the two instances must match exactly. Equivalent noncanonical paths are not resolved. For example, C:\app and C:\temp\\...\app are not equal directory values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the hash code of the current application directory.
Docs.returns: The hash code of the current application directory.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a string representation of the state of the evidence object.
Docs.returns: A representation of the state of the evidence object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is useful during debugging to get an easy-to-read representation of the object.
